summary: Adds Jah'Do Rikaar, a tiger-like follower, part of a sub-species of Khajiit called the Pahmar-Raht.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6][b]JAH'DO RIKAAR[/b][/size][/center]
[b][u]Follower History and Lore[/u]
[/b]
Jah'Do belongs to a sub-species of Khajiit called the Pahmar-Raht, which in official elder scrolls lore are described as khajiit resembling the appearance and size of a tiger. The Pahmar-Raht are a more fierce and bulky sub-species, so they are much bulkier than other Khajiit sub-species. A Khajiit's sub-species is determined by the phases of two moons; Masser and Secunda. The Pahmar-Raht are born when Masser is full and Secunda is waning.

In the Khajiiti Tongue, Ta'agra;
[b]Jah[/b] means Gold
[b]Do[/b] means Warrior

Jah'Do has travelled far from Elsweyr to find another fellow warrior to pillage some villages with and/or be a goody goody with.

[b][u]Stats[/u]

[/b]The Pahmar-Raht are fierce but also sneaky, as they resemble tigers so I have given Jah'Do some perks which contribute towards those attributes, and I have offset his Stamina and Health to compliment his tiger-like strength and agility.

[b][u]Location

[/u][/b]Jah'Do is located in the Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun.

[b][u]Requirements
[/u][/b]
[list]
[*]Official Skyrim patch 1.9.32.0.8 or greater.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/]XPMS[/url]﻿ or [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/]XPMSE[/url]﻿ (XPMSE recommended)
[/list][b][u]

[/u][/b][u][b]Compatibility and Recommended Mods[/b]
[/u]
This follower mod is compatible with any follower framework like [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/]AFT[/url], [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71689]iAFT[/url], [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14037]UFO[/url] and [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12933]EEF[/url]﻿.
I recommend you get [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74568]Relationship Dialogue Overhaul[/url] and [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62040]MHIYH[/url] to get the most you can out of this follower.

[color=#980000][b]For now, this follower CANNOT be transformed into a a vampire or werewolf (I think).[/b][/color]

[b][u]Installation

[/u][/b]Download with favorite mod manager, download manually and extract all files to your 'Data'' folder.


[u][b]Uninstallation and Updating[/b]

[/u]Completely Dismiss your follower from any follower framework you've downloaded, if you haven't downloaded a follower framework then just dismiss your follower normally. After this uninstall through mod manager or delete all files related to this mod.

[color=#f1f1f1]Just to be safe, do a clean save after uninstallation using [/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31724]'SKYRIM Save Cleaner'[/url][color=#f1f1f1]﻿ and AFTER THAT [/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52363/]'Save Game Script Cleaner'[/url][color=#f1f1f1]﻿. Instructions on how to use both are either on YouTube or on the respective mod pages.
[/color]
I suggest the same is done when you are about to update.


[u][b]Credits

[/b][/u][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61132]Bulky Skeleton for Beast Races[/url] by PaganWitcher (Beast Skeleton)
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40043]Muscular Khajiit Textures[/url] by Khajiitas (Body, Hand, Feet Textures)
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52918]Better Claws and Gauntlets[/url] by Derok (Hand Meshes)
[url=https://afkmods.iguanadons.net/index.php?/files/file/1699-fluffy-khajiit-tail/]Fluffy Khajiit Tail[/url] by finius (Tail Meshes and Textures)

[b][u]Mods in Screenshots[/u][/b]

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38386/]Contractor Armor[/url] by Zerofrost
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71081/]Rayek's End Revisited (Mazz's End)[/url] by Mazz
